(11/15) And I would continue to pray for an end to this crisis, for the protection of my congregation, and for the wisdom, safety and discernment of every health care provider and all those in authority. (1 Tim. 2:1-3)

(9/15) Because worship services are the places where we assemble, embrace & share communion & where it is common for older Americans to gather, wisdom suggests we should be careful to protect our people. Louisiana is currently listed in the top 10 states most affected by COVID-19
(6/15) We have to do this to protect our vulnerable populations and ensure that our health care system is not overwhelmed by a rush of newly infected persons.

(5/15) We must remember that the primary reason for the national and state emergency declarations and the public health officials' warnings about large gatherings is to slow, and ultimately stop, the spread of the virus.
